32  void loadModel(const std::string& path) {
33  Assimp::Importer importer;
34  const aiScene* scene = importer.ReadFile(path, aiProcess_Triangulate | aiProcess_FlipUVs | aiProcess_GenSmoothNormals | aiProcess_JoinIdenticalVertices);
35 
36  if (!scene || scene->mFlags & AI_SCENE_FLAGS_INCOMPLETE || !scene->mRootNode) {
37  std::cout << "ERROR::ASSIMP::" << importer.GetErrorString() << std::endl;
38  return;
39  }
40 
41  directory = path.substr(0, path.find_last_of('/'));
42  processNode(scene->mRootNode, scene);
43  }

45  void processNode(aiNode* node, const aiScene* scene) {
46  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < node->mNumMeshes; i++) {
47  aiMesh* mesh = scene->mMeshes[node->mMeshes[i]];

49  }
50 
51  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < node->mNumChildren; i++) {

56  Mesh processMesh(aiMesh* mesh, const aiScene* scene) {
57  std::vector<Vertex> vertices;
58  std::vector<unsigned int> indices;
59  std::vector<Texture> textures;
60 
61  // Process vertices
62  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < mesh->mNumVertices; ++i) {
63  Vertex vertex;
64  glm::vec3 vector;
65 
66  // Position
67  vector.x = mesh->mVertices[i].x;
68  vector.y = mesh->mVertices[i].y;
69  vector.z = mesh->mVertices[i].z;
70  vertex.Position = vector;
71 
72  // Normal
73  vector.x = mesh->mNormals[i].x;
74  vector.y = mesh->mNormals[i].y;
75  vector.z = mesh->mNormals[i].z;
76  vertex.Normal = vector;
77 
78  // Texture coordinates
79  if (mesh->mTextureCoords[0]) {
80  glm::vec2 vec;
81  vec.x = mesh->mTextureCoords[0][i].x;
82  vec.y = mesh->mTextureCoords[0][i].y;
83  vertex.TexCoords = vec;
84  } else {
85  vertex.TexCoords = glm::vec2(0.0f, 0.0f);
86  }
87 
88  vertices.push_back(vertex);
89  }
90 
91  // Process indices
92  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < mesh->mNumFaces; ++i) {
93  aiFace face = mesh->mFaces[i];
94  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < face.mNumIndices; ++j) {
95  indices.push_back(face.mIndices[j]);
96  }
97  }
98 
99  // Process material
100  if (mesh->mMaterialIndex >= 0) {
101  aiMaterial* material = scene->mMaterials[mesh->mMaterialIndex];
102 
103  // Diffuse maps
104  std::vector<Texture> diffuseMaps = loadMaterialTextures(material, aiTextureType_DIFFUSE, "texture_diffuse");
105  textures.insert(textures.end(), diffuseMaps.begin(), diffuseMaps.end());
106 
107  // Specular maps
108  std::vector<Texture> specularMaps = loadMaterialTextures(material, aiTextureType_SPECULAR, "texture_specular");
109  textures.insert(textures.end(), specularMaps.begin(), specularMaps.end());
110  }
111 
112  return Mesh(vertices, indices, textures);
